Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:50.42]All I see are clouds upon my head
[00:54.97]
[00:56.39]Dark clouds and cough clouds
[00:59.36]
[01:00.19]When I lay in my bed
[01:02.28]
[01:04.13]The city sleeps and slumbers
[01:07.28]
[01:10.99]While summer settles under
[01:13.74]
[01:14.69]A blue sky till dark starry night
[01:20.00]
[01:57.61]All I hear is a constant radio
[02:01.81]
[02:05.18]Stars can shine so loud
[02:08.45]
[02:08.64]But of what, I'll never know
[02:11.95]
[02:13.42]The city sleeps and slumbers
[02:16.38]
[02:16.65]While summer settles under
[02:19.98]
[02:20.69]A blue sky till dark starry night
[02:26.38]
[04:04.19]
